BatchGetTraceSummaryById.name: BatchGetTraceSummaryById
BatchGetTraceSummaryById.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata for a list of traces specified by ID

BatchGetTraces.name: BatchGetTraces
BatchGetTraces.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of traces specified by ID. Each trace is a collection of segment documents that originates from a single request. Use GetTraceSummaries to get a list of trace IDs

CreateGroup.name: CreateGroup
CreateGroup.description: Grants permission to create a group resource with a name and a filter expression

CreateSamplingRule.name: CreateSamplingRule
CreateSamplingRule.description: Grants permission to create a rule to control sampling behavior for instrumented applications

DeleteGroup.name: DeleteGroup
DeleteGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a group resource

DeleteResourcePolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
DeleteResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete resource policies

DeleteSamplingRule.name: DeleteSamplingRule
DeleteSamplingRule.description: Grants permission to delete a sampling rule

GetDistinctTraceGraphs.name: GetDistinctTraceGraphs
GetDistinctTraceGraphs.description: Grants permission to retrieve distinct service graphs for one or more specific trace IDs

GetEncryptionConfig.name: GetEncryptionConfig
GetEncryptionConfig.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current encryption configuration for X-Ray data

GetGroup.name: GetGroup
GetGroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve group resource details

GetGroups.name: GetGroups
GetGroups.description: Grants permission to retrieve all active group details

GetInsight.name: GetInsight
GetInsight.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of a specific insight

GetInsightEvents.name: GetInsightEvents
GetInsightEvents.description: Grants permission to retrieve the events of a specific insight

GetInsightImpactGraph.name: GetInsightImpactGraph
GetInsightImpactGraph.description: Grants permission to retrieve the part of the service graph which is impacted for a specific insight

GetInsightSummaries.name: GetInsightSummaries
GetInsightSummaries.description: Grants permission to retrieve the summary of all insights for a group and time range with optional filters

GetSamplingRules.name: GetSamplingRules
GetSamplingRules.description: Grants permission to retrieve all sampling rules

GetSamplingStatisticSummaries.name: GetSamplingStatisticSummaries
GetSamplingStatisticSummaries.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about recent sampling results for all sampling rules

GetSamplingTargets.name: GetSamplingTargets
GetSamplingTargets.description: Grants permission to request a sampling quota for rules that the service is using to sample requests

GetServiceGraph.name: GetServiceGraph
GetServiceGraph.description: Grants permission to retrieve a document that describes services that process incoming requests, and downstream services that they call as a result

GetTimeSeriesServiceStatistics.name: GetTimeSeriesServiceStatistics
GetTimeSeriesServiceStatistics.description: Grants permission to retrieve an aggregation of service statistics defined by a specific time range bucketed into time intervals

GetTraceGraph.name: GetTraceGraph
GetTraceGraph.description: Grants permission to retrieve a service graph for one or more specific trace IDs

GetTraceSummaries.name: GetTraceSummaries
GetTraceSummaries.description: Grants permission to retrieve IDs and metadata for traces available for a specified time frame using an optional filter. To get the full traces, pass the trace IDs to BatchGetTraces

Link.name: Link
Link.description: Grants permission to share X-Ray resources with a monitoring account

ListResourcePolicies.name: ListResourcePolicies
ListResourcePolicies.description: Grants permission to list resource policies

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an X-Ray resource

PutEncryptionConfig.name: PutEncryptionConfig
PutEncryptionConfig.description: Grants permission to update the encryption configuration for X-Ray data

PutResourcePolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
PutResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to create or update resource policies

PutTelemetryRecords.name: PutTelemetryRecords
PutTelemetryRecords.description: Grants permission to send AWS X-Ray daemon telemetry to the service

PutTraceSegments.name: PutTraceSegments
PutTraceSegments.description: Grants permission to upload segment documents to AWS X-Ray. The X-Ray SDK generates segment documents and sends them to the X-Ray daemon, which uploads them in batches

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to an X-Ray resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an X-Ray resource

UpdateGroup.name: UpdateGroup
UpdateGroup.description: Grants permission to update a group resource

UpdateSamplingRule.name: UpdateSamplingRule
UpdateSamplingRule.description: Grants permission to modify a sampling rule's configuration
